short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects from Warpcast to Supercast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Supercast.xyz Redirect Extension: Elevate your Farcasting experience with a single click! Our powerful Chrome extension seamlessly bridges the gap between Warpcast and Supercast.xyz, allowing you to effortlessly access the same page on Supercast.xyz with just a click. Say goodbye to manual navigation and hello to a world of enhanced features, including multi-account support, scheduling, polls, and more. Install the Supercast.xyz Redirect Extension today and unlock the full potential of your Farcasting journey, saving time and simplifying your experience like never before.

Here is the github repo: https://github.com/makerdock/supercast-redirect-chrome-extension
